body:

"Dimly: "Ms Wilkes, if we could have just a few - "You can have a couple of loads of double-ought buck up your cockadoodie bumhole if you dont get out of here! If the police come, it may raise suspicion, but Id rather have them suspicious than have them drive up to the house and hear you making a big cockadoodie fuss.

Sincerely,
Shelby Walter
